key.name: target-language
key.description: Language code (ISO 639-1) to translate messages into.

key.name: provider-id
key.description: Provider identifier to use for translation (e.g., 'argos').

key.name: preserve-format
key.description: Whether to attempt HTML-structure preserving translation.

key.name: venv-path
key.description: Path to the Python virtual environment used for Argos Translate. If empty, use repository-local .venv or system.

key.name: install-on-demand
key.description: Allow automatic download of missing Argos Translate models when needed.
